name: marylander
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Maryland: He is a great athlete, a great sportsman and a great Marylander. 35- to 49-year-olds constitute the single largest group of Marylanders.
More examplesFewer examplesWe are strongly encouraging Marylanders to reduce water consumption.The seat has traditionally gone to a Marylander.Marylanders generally support sending more state aid to the Baltimore school system.
